headline: Target and Dr. Squatch Introduce Kris K. from Target's Limited-Edition "Not Santa" Soap
summary: Target Corporation (NYSE: TGT) today announced an exclusive new product launching Dec. 7 that's bringing festive and sudsy fun to the holidays. Meet "Not Santa," a limited-edition men's soap created in partnership with Dr. Squatch, the No. 1 men's personal care brand in Target stores nationwide, starring none other than Kris K. from Target — the viral sensation who stole hearts (and hashtags) last year, in his first-ever product collaboration.

content.title: Target and Dr. Squatch Introduce Kris K. from Target's Limited-Edition "Not Santa" Soap
